basics.name: Dmitry Ivanov
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary:
Originally from Saint-Petersburg, I obtained a Master's degree in Computer Graphics (CS) from Baltic State Technical University, which laid the foundation for my expertise.

I began my career as a UI/Web designer, collaborating with local startups such as kudago.com, while nurturing a deep passion for open-source projects.

Seeking new challenges and opportunities, I relocated to Montreal, Canada, where I diversified my skill set by working as a frontend/web engineer for local businesses like TTBA and Amaze. During this time, I honed my abilities and gained valuable industry insights. Subsequently, I seized an exciting opportunity at Plotly Inc, where I specialized in WebGL technology, contributing my expertise to cutting-edge projects.

Driven by an innate curiosity and desire to explore different domains, I transitioned into the fintech sector, joining Mobeewave, specializing in mobile payments. This transition allowed me to deepen my understanding of financial technology while contributing to groundbreaking innovations in the field.

Currently, I am working at brainfinance, where I continue to apply my skills and knowledge in a challenging and innovative environment.

In summary, I am a versatile professional with a background in computer graphics, UI/Web design, frontend engineering, and fintech, including specialization in mobile payments. With a commitment to innovation and a passion for cutting-edge technologies, I am actively seeking opportunities that allow me to contribute to the [relevant area/job sought] field and further expand my expertise.
